prompt: Design a dark-themed forgot password screen with a sleek, professional aesthetic. Use a dark gray background (Colors.grey[900]). The content should be centered with a Column layout and crossAxisAlignment.center for a narrower content width (max width 400). Display a 'Forgot Password' title in white (Colors.white), font size 28, and bold weight. Below, add a description in light gray (Colors.grey[400]) saying 'Provide your email to reset your password.' Include a TextField with a filled background (Colors.grey[800]), white hint text 'Enter Email', and a rounded border (borderRadius: 8.0). Use a prefix icon (Icons.email) in teal (Colors.teal[300]). Add an ElevatedButton with a teal background (Colors.teal[400]), white text 'Reset Password', and rounded corners. Place a TextButton below with 'Back to Login' in teal. Use padding of 24.0 and space elements with SizedBox(height: 16.0).
